name: ASIAN, Inc.
description: For more than 50 years, ASIAN, Inc. has been meeting the growing needs of Asian Americans and other minorities, particularly for low- to moderate- income (LMI) Asian Americans with diverse multi-cultural and multi-linguistic needs, by leveraging public and private lender funds to meet the financing and technical assistance needs of emerging small businesses, affordable housing and sustainable homeownership.
